inclusion.criterion: Subject is 14-75 years of age at time of screening
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject has a clinical diagnosis of type 1 diabetes, as determined via medical record or source documentation by an individual qualified to make a medical diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: On pump therapy at the time of screening with insulin sensitivity and insulin carbohydrate ratio
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate venous access as assessed by investigator or appropriate staff
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subject is unable to tolerate tape adhesive in the area of sensor placement
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject has any unresolved adverse skin condition in the area of sensor or device placement (e.g., psoriasis, rash, Staphylococcus infection)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject is actively participating in an investigational study (drug or device) wherein they have received treatment from an investigational study (drug or device) in the last 2 weeks
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject has a positive urine or serum pregnancy screening test
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 25-year-old man with type 1 diabetes confirmed with molecular analysis 7 years ago. He presents to the clinic with shortness of breath and fatigue during activities.
